name: Confined Domain System
description:
CDS - stands for Confined Domain System. It was created to contain the programs as the future artificial intelligence, which was masked to imitate human brain activity. 
The Game is very short, experimental and might become a full version one day.
This is my first project and I am looking forward to seeing some feedback. 
 Entire Map, fonts and textures are made by my co- developer.
Hope you enjoy the experience.
Important Clue - Don't Stand under the DOORS!
Thanks for future comments and feedback.
Apish Box Games.
